title: Does anyone knowes what font is used at the World Cup 2006? thanks
content:

| --- | --- |
| [emblem\_grn\_l.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071827/http:/typophile.com/files/emblem_grn_l.jpg) | 75.06 KB |

 [‹ Swiss Bank Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071827/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20930 "Go to previous forum topic") [Weiss ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071827/http:/www.typophile.com/node/1905 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jangir

comments.content: I believe that is something custom from DaMa.

Yeah, I’d certainly say custom.

—————  
**Paul Ducco**  
 [Solid Creative](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071827/http:/www.solid-creative.com/)

Thank you for your time

I will check it out.

did som research:  
found out that DaMa has just mad custom font for Puma jerseys, nothing about the Graphic profile of the World cup 2006.

Here’s a link that will help : [http://www.whitestone.ac/clients/2006/typeface.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071827/http:/www.whitestone.ac/clients/2006/typeface.htm "http://www.whitestone.ac/clients/2006/typeface.htm")

I know that it is called welcome, but that’s about it.

Graham

though perhaps shoulda looked at the previous post first. doh.

Graham

Thanks alot, The link really did help.  
I love the typeface, maybe I´m affected by the world cup :)

jangir

[Welcome](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071827/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Welcome) is the name of the font you are looking for. I don’t think that it is available except from FIFA.

An interesting alternative is FontShop’s [Trivia](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306071827/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Trivia).

Thanks Dan,

Trivia is an excelent alternative!

Jangir
